original_text: And I saw another mighty angel come down from heaven, clothed with a cloud: and a rainbow was upon his head, and his face was as it were the sun, and his feet as pillars of fire:
korean_text: 내가 또 보니 힘 센 다른 천사가 구름을 입고 하늘에서 내려오는데 그 머리 위에 무지개가 있고 그 얼굴은 해 같고 그 발은 불기둥 같으며

sentences.original_text: And I saw another mighty angel
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 또 다른 강한 천사를 보니

sentences.original_text: and a rainbow was upon his head,
and his face was as it were the sun,
and his feet as pillars of fire:
